enum_table.name: cost
enum_table.comment: NOTE: Make sure to update the Chinese Age 3 Great Wall Landmark as it doesn't inherit from these costs. Also make sure to update the upgrade dev/ages/imperial_age and imperial_age_mon as that doesn't inherit from these costs. If trying to modify on per entity or per race basis reach out to UI team to modify code to support this, changes like this could affect Age Up display indicator.
